pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Added button to select mesh file on inspector

content.raw:
Looks good, just two UI details that are somewhat subjective:

The default mesh URI for a simple shape is often the name of the link (unit_cylinder, etc.). It seem strange that the default URI is invalid.

When I enter an invalid mesh URI and hit "OK", I get a pop-up, which is good, but then the Link Inspector exits. It might be nice not to exit, in case the user made a mistake entering the URI and wants to redo it.
content.html:
Looks good, just two UI details that are somewhat subjective:

The default mesh URI for a simple shape is often the name of the link (unit_cylinder, etc.). It seem strange that the default URI is invalid.

When I enter an invalid mesh URI and hit "OK", I get a pop-up, which is good, but then the Link Inspector exits. It might be nice not to exit, in case the user made a mistake entering the URI and wants to redo it.
